email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are exploring options for shipping 85,000MT of iron ore from Santos to Rotterdam under CFR terms. We have identified the MV OCEAN HORIZON as a potential vessel for this shipment. Could you confirm her current position and availability? Additionally, could you provide an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Maria Lopez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for reaching out. The MV OCEAN HORIZON is currently in Singapore and could be positioned to Santos for your laycan, ideally starting from October 10. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD 18.50 per metric tonne. This rate includes fuel but excludes any potential demurrage charges.

Let me know your thoughts or if you need further details!
Cheers,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Thank you for the prompt response and details. The rate of USD 18.50 seems a bit high considering current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 17.80 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, and the loading window in Santos is expected to be from October 10 to October 15.

Let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.
Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

The revised rate of USD 17.80 looks acceptable. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Great to hear that! We confirm the laycan as October 10 to October 15. We will ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.
Cheers,
John
